name: Half Life
description:
Race against the clock and match elements together to score points! But be careful - these elements will decay into less valuable isotopes, so act fast!

Made for SMU Guildhall Winter 2020 Jam

Programming, art, and audio done/created by me (except for the FFVII Victory Fanfare)

How to Start:

To run the game, unzip the file and run the .exe within the new folder (you want to have all the other stuff in the folder for it to work)

How to Play:

WASD/arrows - move puck

P - start game when prompted/pause

M - mute

ESC - return to start screen while paused

Match at least four tiles with the same isotope (same color) to clear them and get points.

Unstable isotopes (U-238, Th-232, Po-216, Bi-214) will decay at varying rates and eventually become lower-value isotopes (U-234, Th-228, Po-212, Bi-210).
